title.narrative: HANDIKOS - Supporting children and adults with disabilities for their rights and needs towards integration and participation in the society

description.narrative: HandiKOS is a Non-Governmental Organization of and for people with disability in Kosovo established since 1983. Handikos will continue the provision of services especially for children with disabilities e.g. primary physical rehabilitation and psycho-socia l activities offering/repairing orthopaedic equipment supporting the referrals to education and health services and providing peer-support for parents. At the same time through lobbying for the rights and equal opportunities for People with Disabilities (P WD) HandiKOS is increasing its efforts to reach financial sustainability for the services HandiKOS is providing.Main objectives of the project are: a) To include the interests of PWD during the process of drafting and implementing policies that deal with d isability issues strengthening the self-representation of PWD b)To ensure upgrade and sustain service provision for PWD c) To improve economical situation of PWD. Main beneficiaries from this project are people with disabilities from Kosovo. They will bene fit from the services that HandiKOS is providing as well as from the training programs peer support activities and referral system.
